chunks.zh: 现在大家手机卡套餐，怎么选择
chunks.en: How do you choose a mobile phone plan now?

chunks.zh: 是不是还高额的套餐，还是说一个保号，一个流量；
chunks.en: Are you still using expensive plans, or are you using one for number preservation and one for data?

chunks.zh: 我看现在身边的朋友，都已尽换成了两张卡的
chunks.en: I see that my friends around me have all switched to using two cards.

chunks.zh: 保号➕29 元长期流量卡顺便推广下我自用的： https://172.lot-ml.com/ProductEn/Index/1f1164a8d16f8be7
chunks.en: Number preservation + 29 yuan long-term data plan, also promoting the one I use myself: https://172.lot-ml.com/ProductEn/Index/1f1164a8d16f8be7

chunks.zh: 一张改了 8 元套餐的移动老卡。
chunks.en: One old China Mobile card changed to an 8 yuan plan.

chunks.zh: 一张 29 元流量卡，考虑换成 19 元的流量卡。
chunks.en: One 29 yuan data plan card, considering switching to a 19 yuan data plan card.

chunks.zh: 主打一个省钱
chunks.en: Focusing on saving money.

chunks.zh: 顺便给看到这个贴子的北京 V 友们推荐下面这个链接中的套餐方案链接： https://jsj.top/f/AZY6l4
chunks.en: By the way, for Beijing V users who see this post, I recommend the plan link in the following link: https://jsj.top/f/AZY6l4

chunks.zh: 免费办理渠道：QQ 群 817226839
chunks.en: Free application channel: QQ group 817226839

chunks.zh: @cksspk #1 请教个问题
chunks.en: @cksspk #1 Asking a question,

chunks.zh: 我 tg 上面全是搞黄色的东西，有没有正常有趣的群聊，想使用一下正常的 tg ，群组机器人随便一个关键词都是 ghs 顶不住了快。
chunks.en: My Telegram is full of pornographic content. Are there any normal and interesting group chats? I want to use normal Telegram. Any keyword in the group robot is full of porn. I can't stand it.

chunks.zh: @MrQSJ #28 是的，只有三方，三方也是和官方合作的。
chunks.en: @MrQSJ #28 Yes, it's only third-party, and the third-party also cooperates with the official.

chunks.zh: 但官方套餐不会出这类流量卡的。
chunks.en: But the official package will not offer this type of data plan.

chunks.zh: 我自己是两张卡：5 元电信保号 200M 流量+29 元电信 185G 流量+100 分钟通话
chunks.en: I have two cards myself: 5 yuan China Telecom number preservation with 200M of data + 29 yuan China Telecom 185G of data + 100 minutes of call time

chunks.zh: 顺便推广下我的店铺：https://172.lot-ml.com/ProductEn/index/6f415ba9f55dd55ehttps://hk.usim.vip/s/YWb1PPZK
chunks.en: Also promoting my store: https://172.lot-ml.com/ProductEn/index/6f415ba9f55dd55ehttps://hk.usim.vip/s/YWb1PPZK

chunks.zh: 已经四张卡了，一张老卡绑定很多东西，一张流量卡，一张卡用来接公司上网短信，一张 tg 接码卡。
chunks.en: Already four cards, one old card is bound to many things, one data card, one card is used to receive company internet SMS, and one Telegram code card.

chunks.zh: 人都晕了
chunks.en: I'm dizzy.

chunks.zh: 联通主卡 79 + 4 + 增值业务 20 - 充值返还 25 + 副卡 10 = 88, 流量为 55(可结转) + 115 省内 + 增值送 3 +30 定向 + 低消送 15, 总量 218(不含定向 188)
chunks.en: China Unicom main card 79 + 4 + value-added service 20 - recharge rebate 25 + secondary card 10 = 88, data is 55 (can be carried over) + 115 within the province + value-added gift 3 + 30 targeted + minimum consumption gift 15, total 218 (excluding targeted 188)

chunks.zh: 备用收快递移动 39 - 30 (优惠半年), 半年后再转 8 自.
chunks.en: Backup receive express delivery China Mobile 39 - 30 (half-year discount), and then switch to 8 after half a year.

chunks.zh: 合计 97
chunks.en: Total of 97

chunks.zh: 8 块移动老卡保号+29 流量卡(155g),
chunks.en: 8 yuan China Mobile old card for number preservation + 29 data card (155g),

chunks.zh: 流量卡准备换个 19 的,虽然只能用一两年,到时候再换
chunks.en: Planning to change the data card to a 19 yuan one, although it can only be used for one or two years, then change it again.

chunks.zh: 一个保号，一个流量。
chunks.en: One for number preservation, one for data.

chunks.zh: 自己换完还帮家里人换，降本就对了
chunks.en: After changing it myself, I also helped my family change it, reducing costs is the right thing to do.

chunks.zh: 一张移动主卡 10 元保号，一张 29 元移动流量卡。
chunks.en: One China Mobile main card for 10 yuan number preservation, one 29 yuan China Mobile data card.

chunks.zh: 保号+流量的组合是不是没有通话时间了？
chunks.en: Does the combination of number preservation + data not have call time?

chunks.zh: 主卡移动全家享 3 折 ¥59 60G 流量+1000M 宽带+多少通话忘了 反正基本不咋用
chunks.en: Main card China Mobile family enjoys 30% discount ¥59 60G data + 1000M broadband + how much call time I forgot, anyway, I basically don’t use it much

chunks.zh: 我和媳妇原本的号码转 8 元套餐
chunks.en: My wife and I changed our original numbers to 8 yuan plans

chunks.zh: 另外还开了 2 个免费副卡
chunks.en: In addition, I opened 2 free secondary cards

chunks.zh: 总共¥75
chunks.en: Total of ¥75

chunks.zh: 一张电信 ifree 0 月租保号,
chunks.en: One China Telecom ifree 0 monthly rent number preservation,

chunks.zh: 一个广电流量卡 19 元/180GB
chunks.en: One China Broadcasting Network data card 19 yuan/180GB

chunks.zh: 移动 8 元+25 元潮玩包（ 20g 通用+几十 g 定向）
chunks.en: China Mobile 8 yuan + 25 yuan trendy play package (20g general + dozens of g targeted)

chunks.zh: 联通 29 元 105G 流量 100 分钟通话，移动 20 块 20G ，都是曾经一直用的号码改的套餐，舍不得扔掉号码。
chunks.en: China Unicom 29 yuan 105G data 100 minutes of call time, China Mobile 20 yuan 20G, both are plans changed from numbers that I have always used, and I am reluctant to throw away the numbers.

chunks.zh: 电信星卡 49 325GB 流量 在当宽带用。
chunks.en: China Telecom Star Card 49 325GB data is used as broadband.

chunks.zh: 还有一张广电的双百。
chunks.en: There is also a China Broadcasting Network dual hundred.

chunks.zh: 携号转网移动 永久三折🤣 每月只要 89 块钱全家八张卡用，流量电话用不完根本用不完
chunks.en: Number portability to China Mobile permanent 30% discount🤣 Only 89 yuan per month for the whole family to use eight cards, the data and phone calls can't be used up at all.

chunks.zh: @18k 这怎么弄的?
chunks.en: @18k How do you do this?

chunks.zh: 联通 108 ，500M 宽带绑定 20G+400 分钟
chunks.en: China Unicom 108, 500M broadband bound to 20G+400 minutes

chunks.zh: 移动 8+18 ，保号套餐 + 100G 省内流量包
chunks.en: China Mobile 8+18, number preservation plan + 100G provincial data package

chunks.zh: @18k 哪里的政策啊
chunks.en: @18k Where is the policy?

chunks.zh: 一个月 30 多块，无限流量随便用，宽带都不用装
chunks.en: More than 30 yuan a month, unlimited data to use as you like, no need to install broadband.
